frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-macbook-battery-percentage-corrector
frozen.shortDescription: Corrects only the battery percentage shown in the panel aggregate menu.
frozen.longDescription:
Corrects only the battery percentage shown in the panel aggregate menu.
Does not mess with UPower or other subsystems. Special thanks to @andenlol.
